trans-unit.source: Defines arrays of colors and positions used for interpolating color blending in a multicolor gradient.
trans-unit.target: 定義用於多色漸層的變化色彩漸變之色彩和位置陣列。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example is intended to be used in a Windows Forms environment.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用 Windows Form 環境中。

trans-unit.source: It demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend> class in conjunction with the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> class to draw an ellipse to screen that has its colors blended.
trans-unit.target: 它會示範如何使用<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend>類別搭配<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>類別繪製橢圓形螢幕上，會有其混合的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The ellipse is green on the left, blends to yellow, then to blue, and finally to red on the right.
trans-unit.target: 橢圓形左邊綠色，為黃色，則為藍色，最後為紅色，在右邊的混合。

trans-unit.source: This is accomplished through the settings in the `myColors` and `myPositions` arrays used in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.Colors%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.Positions%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這透過在設定來完成`myColors`和`myPositions`使用的陣列<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.Colors%2A>和<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.Positions%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush.InterpolationColors%2A> property of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> object named `lgBrush2` must be made equal to the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend> object `myBlend`.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush.InterpolationColors%2A>屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>名為物件`lgBrush2`必須設定成等於<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend>物件`myBlend`。

trans-unit.source: The number of colors and positions in this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend" />.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend" /> 中的色彩和位置數量。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend" /> class with the specified number of colors and positions.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定數量的色彩和位置，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: For an example see <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.%23ctor%2A>
trans-unit.target: 如範例，請參閱 <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an array of colors that represents the colors to use at corresponding positions along a gradient.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定色彩的陣列，表示要在沿著漸層的對應位置使用的色彩。

trans-unit.source: An array of <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> structures that represents the colors to use at corresponding positions along a gradient.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 結構的陣列，表示要在沿著漸層的對應位置使用的色彩。

trans-unit.source: This property is an array of <xref:System.Drawing.Color> structures that represents the colors to use at corresponding positions along a gradient.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是陣列<xref:System.Drawing.Color>結構，表示要使用在對應的位置，沿著漸層的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Along with the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.Positions%2A> property, this property defines a multicolor gradient.
trans-unit.target: 連同<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.Positions%2A>屬性，這個屬性會定義多彩漸層。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the positions along a gradient line.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定沿著漸層線的位置。

trans-unit.source: An array of values that specify percentages of distance along the gradient line.
trans-unit.target: 值的陣列，指定沿著漸層線的距離百分比。

trans-unit.source: The elements of this array specify percentages of distance along the gradient line.
trans-unit.target: 這個陣列的項目指定百分比沿著漸層線的距離。

trans-unit.source: For example, an element value of 0.2f specifies that this point is 20 percent of the total distance from the starting point.
trans-unit.target: 例如，項目值的 0.2 指定此點是起始點的總距離的 20%。

trans-unit.source: The elements in this array are represented by float values between 0.0f and 1.0f, and the first element of the array must be 0.0f and the last element must be 1.0f.
trans-unit.target: 這個陣列中的項目都由介於 0.0 f 到 1.0 f，浮點值陣列的第一個項目必須是 0.0 f 和最後一個項目必須是 1.0 f。

trans-unit.source: Along with the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.Colors%2A> property, this property defines a multicolor gradient.
trans-unit.target: 連同<xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ColorBlend.Colors%2A>屬性，這個屬性會定義多彩漸層。
